verses.roman:
nityānanda-sārvabhauma āgraha kariñā
nīlācale āilā mahāprabhuke la-iñā

synonyms: nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; āgraha kariñā—showing great eagerness; nīlācale—to Jagannātha Purī; āilā—returned; mahāprabhuke—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; la-iñā—taking.
translation: When the devotees from Bengal arrived at Jagannātha Purī, both Nityānanda Prabhu and Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya greatly endeavored to take Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu back to Jagannātha Purī.
